name: Vampire Hospital
description:
Welcome to the
Vampire Hospital!

You're a Transfusion Doctor who was once touched by the curse of vampirism! Now you are spending the rest of your life in your castle hospital, trying to cure as many people as you can. 

The voices in your head are clearer each second and you know, there will be the time when you will be forced to consume blood meant for someone else.

Time's ticking, make a choice...
